```{r}
df <- read.csv('../cleaning_data-02.csv')
df <- replace(df, is.na(df), 99999)
print(head(df))

```
```{r}
library(caret)
set.seed(123)

train_idx <- createDataPartition(df$D1A_1V1L, p = 0.8, list = FALSE)
train <- df[train_idx, ]
test <- df[-train_idx, ]



```


```{r}

# Fit the model in linear model
model1=lm(D1A_1V1L~.,data=train)

# Predict with the test data
pred <- predict(model1, newdata = test)

# Calculate test error with MSE
mse <- mean((test$Apps - pred)^2)

# Calculate test error with RMSE
rmse <- sqrt(mse)

# Print test error
cat("MSE:", mse, "\n")
cat("RMSE:", rmse)

# summary of model 
summary(model1)


```
